column4: hello all. New to ubuntu here....may jump suse ship to contribute here....doesnt play with bcm4318...kinda getting sick of their friking rpms..
is mplayer supported in ubuntu?
with integration for firefox?
that'll do it with the quicktime no?
cool..
like said will likely jump ship..the whole yast thing aint working out for me anymore..
hope peeps can help a brotha from another motha out... :)
so fill me in...newbie type question..only one iso cd required...and the rest is downloaded..ie open office etc?
or point me at docs...thats fine... :)
they're on the CD, but yeah, the stuff that isn't included cna be downloaded
yes, only one CD.
which distro?  debian 6cds?
ah.  I was going t say, debian's CDs are just downloaded additional packages.  but yeah, one CD.
yes.  Ubuntu is based on debian.
asterisk is in ubuntu repositories, yes. openser isnt.
don't use ubuntuguide
why??
because some stuff it recommends is unsafe.  And almost all of the stuff it walks you through is available on the wiki (help.ubuntu.com) anyway (in safe methods)
any help for wompus-cat and his nvidia issue/audigy se ...my google search yielded only the ubuntu guide entry
she might want to try the work around I posted earlier just to see...and back up any config files...
